item.description:
We're continuing to meet on Mondays for a bit as we did in June. Not changing the name just yet, and it might move back to Thursday at some point. Or even to the original Tuesday tradition...

We've also changed the start time to 6:30 PM.
item.how_to_find_us: Photos of some members are on meetup and at http://xtcboston.blogspot.com
item.name: eXtreme Thursday Club - Boston Monthly Meetup
